Dashboard

Below are the tools planned for exploring and interacting with corpora data. These modules are currently under development and will be powered by Streamlit apps in the future.

Corpus Explorer

Get an overview of key attributes for each corpus in tabular form. View statistics sourced from a CSV file.

Document Browser / Data Explorer

Define a document collection using search criteria, view documents, and download matched results with metadata and statistics.

Annotation Feature Viewer

Visualize annotation features, including verb positions in German clauses, using CAS-data (.xmi) from zip archives.
